p: The flavonoids present in cichory consist of flavanols, flavonols, flavones and anthocyanins. The identified compounds are glycosides of quercetin, luteolin, kaempferol, myricetin, apigenin, chrysoeriol, jaquelin, isorhamnetin [ 13]. The blue color of the perianth is given by anthocyanins: delphinidine and its derivates cyanidin, pelargonidin and petunidin derivatives [ 14].
